top.title: Trump warns new Venezuelan leader as Maduro set to appear in court
top.summary: Trump said Venezuela's interim president Delcy Rodríguez could "pay a very big price, probably bigger than Maduro" if she "doesn't do what's right".

top.title: 'We need Greenland': Trump repeats threat to annex Danish territory
top.summary: The US president has repeatedly said he wants the island to become a part of the US.

top.title: Ten found guilty of cyber-bullying Brigitte Macron
top.summary: A Paris court found them guilty of "malicious" bullying towards the wife of the French president.

top.title: Watch: BBC reporter tests AI anti-shoplifting tech
top.summary: Some major retailers and independent stores have introduced AI body scans, CCTV or facial recognition equipment to identify crimes like shoplifting.

top.title: AI teachers and cybernetics - what could the world look like in 2050?
top.summary: We asked several experts to predict the technology we'll be using by 2050

top.title: Woman felt 'dehumanised' after Musk's Grok AI used to digitally remove her clothes
top.summary: The BBC has seen several examples of it undressing women and putting them in sexual situations without their consent.
